name: photovoltaic laminate production, CIS | photovoltaic laminate, CIS | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8998/documentation

Production of photovoltaic thin film laminates by thermal vaporization in vacuum. The modules produced at Würth Solar have a size of 1.2m by 0.6m. The weight is 12.6kg. The efficiency is 10%. The rated nominal power is about 75-80Wp per module.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



Electricity use, materials, transport of materials, treatment of production wastes. Disposal after end of life. Process emissions not known (except Cd).
category: C:Manufacturing/26:Manufacture of computer, electronic and optical products/261:Manufacture of electronic components and boards/2610:Manufacture of electronic components and boards

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data refer to 2007. Production in 2006 was ramped up.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data for Würth Solar in Germany.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Production technology of thin film CIS cells with thermal vaporization in vacuum.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Data for coating materials derived from own assumptions.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Literature data based on producer information.
